mapper.insert: INSERT INTO diary(diarydate, history, photoid, email, foodname) VALUES(#{diarydate}, #{history}, #{photoid}, #{email}, #{foodname})
mapper.select: SELECT d.datano, d.email, d.history, d.foodname, d.diarydate, d.photoid, f.calories, p.photoid AS photoid, p.photourl, p.originname, p.uploadname FROM diary d LEFT JOIN photos p ON d.PHOTOID = p.PHOTOID INNER JOIN foodinfo f ON d.FOODNAME = f.FOODNAME WHERE d.email = #{email} AND d.diarydate = #{seldate} ORDER BY d.datano DESC

SELECT ROUND(SUM(f.CALORIES)) AS calsum, ROUND(SUM(f.CARBOHYDRATES)) AS carbsum, ROUND(SUM(f.PROTEINS)) AS proteinsum, ROUND(SUM(f.FATS)) AS fatsum, d.DIARYDATE AS diarydate FROM diary d INNER JOIN foodinfo f ON TRIM(LOWER(f.FOODNAME)) = TRIM(LOWER(d.FOODNAME)) WHERE d.EMAIL = #{email} AND d.DIARYDATE = #{seldate} GROUP BY d.DIARYDATE

SELECT YEAR(d.DIARYDATE) AS year, MONTH(d.DIARYDATE) AS month, WEEK(d.DIARYDATE, 0) - WEEK(DATE_SUB(d.DIARYDATE, INTERVAL DAYOFMONTH(d.DIARYDATE) - 1 DAY), 0)+ 1 AS week, round(avg(f.CALORIES)) AS calsum, round(avg(f.CARBOHYDRATES)) carbsum, round(avg(f.PROTEINS)) proteinsum, round(avg(f.FATS)) fatsum FROM diary d INNER JOIN foodinfo f ON d.FOODNAME = f.FOODNAME WHERE d.EMAIL = #{email} GROUP BY YEAR(d.DIARYDATE), MONTH(d.DIARYDATE), week HAVING month = #{month} AND year = #{year} ORDER BY year, month, week;
